title: 10 MINS TO TIMES SQ! W/ NYC SKYLINE & WATER VIEWS
posting_body: ['FURNISHED', 'MODERN 2-BDR APT W/ MANHATTAN SKYLINE & WATER VIEWS (Available Immediately): Can be delivered unfurnished if preferred', "-COMMUTER'S DREAM: Less than 10-min bus ride to NYC!", 'Bus stop in front of the house that frequently goes Times Square/ Port Authority Bus Terminal (PABT).', 'Right on the border of Hoboken as well with bus services and situated just out of Lincoln Tunnel.', "Close to Trader Joe's", '-FULL MANHATTAN SKYLINE & WATER VIEWS:', 'The unit has unobstructed views the city from uptown to downtown!', '-AMENITIES: In front of the new Weehawken Reservoir Park with wildlife and running trail.', '-MODERN & SPACIOUS:', 'Huge open layout 2-bedroom apartment with granite kitchen, new appliances, full bath with jacuzzi, and lots of dimmable recessed lights.', '-NEW & FURNISHED:', 'The bedrooms along with other rooms (dining & living room) will be delivered furnished with contemporary FURNITURE.', 'Equipped with Smart TV with Netflix.', 'Fireplace, Smart Door Locks and Intercom System in place; Can be delivered unfurnished if preferred', '-PARKING & LAUNDRY: Laundry in the building and driveway parking is available for additional fee.', 'BACKYARD: There is private access to wide zen backyard with deck, patio furniture, garden, fish pond, etc.', '-ABOUT YOU:', 'Responsible clean and pay rent on time.', '-TERM: Minimum of 1 year lease.', 'One month rent and security deposit before move-in.', "No broker's fee.", '-AVAILABILITY: Available Oct. 1, 2022.', 'For serious inquiries please reply to this listing.']
